# C306

This package provides a collection of useful R codes for data analysis from the Biostatistics group at OUCRU-HCM.

## Installation

You can install C306 from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("oucru-biostats/C306")
```

## Website

Documentation of this package can be found at:
[http://lampk.github.io/C306/](http://lampk.github.io/C306/)
